chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: &progname; is a PHP framework designed to assist in developing PHP Applications running on Linux servers using anApache web-server and PostgreSQL database. &progname; contains the key modules for installing and administrating an application such as user and group management and configuration. &progname; uses a modular approch which allows testing of key components using phpunit.

This manual explains how to use &progname; to build your applications and how to carry out unit tests using PHPUnit for testing the application Classes and functional tests using PHPUnit and Selenium Webdriver.
